hero.title: Caritas Mutare
hero.subtitle: Sangano revaCatholic rinobatsira nharaunda
hero.description: Tinobatsira Diocese yeMutare, Zimbabwe nechinzwiro, tariro, uye zvirongwa zvekusimudzira nharaunda.

about.title: Nezve Caritas Mutare
about.missionText: Kushandira varombo uye kusimudzira budiriro yevanhu kuburikidza nezvirongwa zvinobatsira nharaunda zvinogadzirisa zvikonzero zvehurombo nekusaruramisira.
about.visionText: Nharaunda yakarurama uye ine tsitsi umo munhu wese anogona kurarama nezvikudzo uye kusvika pachikwaniso chavo chese.
about.valuesText: Tinotungamirwa nedzidziso yeCatholic yenharaunda, tichishanda nemunharaunda kugadzira shanduko isingaperi kuburikidza nekubatana, kuzvimirira, uye chinhu chakanaka chese.

programs.title: Zvirongwa Zvedu
programs.description: Tinoita zvirongwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvekusimudzira nharaunda muDiocese yeMutare

education.title: Dzidzo neKudzidzisa
education.description: Kupa mukana wekuwana dzidzo yemhando yepamusoro uye kudzidziswa kwehunyanzvi kuvana nevakuru

healthcare.title: Hutano neKudya
healthcare.description: Kuvandudza hutano hwevanhu kuburikidza nekurapa, zvirongwa zvekudya, uye dzidziso yehutano

agriculture.title: Kurima neKudya Kwakachengeteka
agriculture.description: Kutsigira nzira dzekurima dzakasimba uye zvirongwa zvekudya kwakachengeteka

livelihood.title: Kutsigira Hupenyu
livelihood.description: Kugadzira mikana yehupfumi kuburikidza nemari diki uye kusimudzira hunyanzvi

emergency.title: Kupindura Njodzi
emergency.description: Kupa rubatsiro rwekukurumidza panguva yenhamo uye njodzi dzechisikigo

donate.title: Tsigira Chinangwa Chedu
donate.description: Mupiro wako unotibatsira kuenderera mberi nebasa redu rinokosha rekusimudzira nharaunda
donate.name: Zita Rizere

volunteer.title: Zvipira Nesu
volunteer.description: Joinwai chinangwa chedu chekushandira nharaunda uye kuita shanduko

contact.title: Taura Nesu
contact.description: Taura nesu kuti uwane rumwe ruzivo kana kuti ubatanidzwe

footer.description: Caritas Mutare yakazvipira kushandira nharaunda kuburikidza nedzidziso yeCatholic yenharaunda uye zvirongwa zvekusimudzira nharaunda.
